Package org.thingsboard.server.dao.cassandra.guava

Class GuavaDriverContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datastax.oss.driver.internal.core.context.DefaultDriverContext
      • org.thingsboard.server.dao.cassandra.guava.GuavaDriverContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.context.DriverContext, com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.detach.AttachmentPoint, com.datastax.oss.driver.internal.core.context.InternalDriverContext
    public class GuavaDriverContext
extends com.datastax.oss.driver.internal.core.context.DefaultDriverContext
    A Custom DefaultDriverContext that overrides DefaultDriverContext.getRequestProcessorRegistry() to return a RequestProcessorRegistry that includes processors for returning guava futures.
